Roadkill .NET wiki engine is a lightweight but powerful Wiki engine built on the following foundations:

* .NET 4.0
* jQuery
* ASP.NET MVC 3 with Razor
* NHibernate
* Creole Wiki syntax
* SQL Server (although it supports mySQL, SQlite, Oracle - anything that NHibernate supports)

It's themeable, well documented, supports Active Directory authentication and is extremely easy to use. It's also Open Source and free.

* Download the latest version (see the pre-requisites before installing)
* Play with a live demo
* [[support|Get some support]]
* [[documentation|Read the documentation]]
* [[http://hg.shrinkrays.net/roadkill/src|Be awe-struck or bemused by the source code]].
